proviso.#tail:
, That such plan shall include,
			 but not be limited to, investigations into smuggling and trafficking
			 methods, detailed resource and staffing requirements at each Department to
			 combat these organizations,  and how existing assets will be deployed to
			 secure the border:

, That such plan shall be submitted within 45 days from enactment of this Act with quarterly
			 updates thereafter until September 30, 2015.

			 appropriated, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other
			 purposes, namely:

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2648 PCS: Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2014
